	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SubscriptionId as string,
		SubscriptionCreatedDate as string,
		SubscriptionStartDate as string,
		SubscriptionStatusCurrent as string,
		MCRecordCreatedDate as string,
		MCRecordUpdatedDate as string
	),
	entity: 'SubscriptionProfile.cdm.json/SubscriptionProfile',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	partitionPath: (concat(toString(currentUTC(),'yyyy'),'/',toString(currentUTC(),'MM'),'/',toString(currentUTC(),'dd'))),
	folderPath: 'CDM',
	fileSystem: 'adhocextract',
	subformat: 'parquet',
	corpusPath: 'CDM',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'adhocextract',
	truncate: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		SubscriptionId,
		SubscriptionCreatedDate,
		SubscriptionStartDate,
		SubscriptionStatusCurrent,
		MCRecordCreatedDate,
		MCRecordUpdatedDate
	)) ~> AzureSubscriptionProfileOutEDL

	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:[(concat('Audit_', toString(currentUTC(),'yyyyMMdd_HHmm'),'.csv'))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Pipeline,
		{Date of Business},
		{Batch Window},
		{Row Count},
		{Pipeline Start Dttm},
		{Pipeline End Dttm},
		{Pipeline Status}

	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SinkAudit
